casebody.data:
TOWN OF BOONE
v.
STATE of North Carolina, et al. No. 93A15-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 21, 2016. Lauren M. Clemmons, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Jim W. Phillips, Jr., Greensboro, for Town of Boone. Julia C. Ambrose, Raleigh, for Town of Boone. Daniel F.E. Smith, Greensboro, for Town of Boone. Stacy C. Eggers, IV, Boone, for County of Watauga.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File *604Brief filed on the 21st of January 2016 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of January 2016."
